story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_0200_10:
That was quick! You must’ve really wanted
to see me, huh.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_0500_10:
He said he’s cheering for both of you, so he
can’t train with just one.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_0600_10: Kris and I were in the same boat...
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_0700_10:
But we didn’t wanna just stand by and
watch, so we decided we’d each pick a side
and help out!
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_0800_10:
You better not be disappointed I’m here
instead of Lance.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_0900_10: Not at all! I’m grateful for your time!
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Thank you too, Lyra! I’m so glad you’re
helping me!
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Ethan...aren’t you pushing yourself a bit
too hard?
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Oh? You two must be pretty close for you to
notice that.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I’m just used to observing Pokémon, so it’s
the same with my friends.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_1800_10: I guess I can’t hide anything from you, Lyra.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_1900_10: Yeah...I think I might be panicking a little.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I’ve been trying to awaken my arc suit with
Lugia...
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_2100_10: but it hasn’t been going so well.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_2200_10:
I’m sure Silver’s gonna awaken his arc
suit—and the power that comes with it...
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_2500_10:
With that kind of attitude, you’re NOT ready
for an arc suit.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_2600_10:
You must’ve chosen Lugia ’cause it’s a
strong, rare Pokémon, right?
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_2800_10: I thought you might say that.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_2900_10:
My master gave you his approval, after all,
at the shrine in the Dragon’s Den.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_3000_10:
I was there when Lance awakened his
arc suit.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Seeing it shine made me realize what I was
missing until now.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Why do people and Pokémon live side by
side? Why do we battle?
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_3300_10:
I think you’re much closer to answering that
than I am, Ethan.
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_3500_10:
What is most important for raising Pokémon?
What helps you to win battles?
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_3600_10:
Your answers to these questions have
already been carved deep into your soul!
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_3900_10:
Just what I’d expect from the world’s best
Dragon-type master!
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_4100_10:
(Well...it was mostly stuff I heard my master
say...)
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_4300_10: Come at me with your full power!
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_4400_10:
We’ll draw out all the strength you and
Lugia can muster!
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_4600_10: We’ll show you our souls’ unique shine!
story_arceus_05_06000/2401_1001_4700_10: I, Gym Leader Clair, accept your challenge!
